content:
/>
IX.iii.1.C.7.a
.
Impact of the Sale or Transfer of Real Estate or Personal Property on Old-Law Pension
Profit from the sale of real estate or personal property
is
considered income for purposes of Old-Law Pension, per
38 CFR 3.262(k)(3)
.
In this respect, Old-Law Pension is different from Section 306 and current-law pension.
title: M21-1, Part IX, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section C - Section 306 Pension and Old-Law Pension
citation: Part IX, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section C
